txt.en: Still stitching?
The leader of the Tailor's Guild has asked you to sew a beautiful set of robes to show the apprentices.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nSew a guild-pattern robe.
Back to Basics - Robe
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern robe

'Robes are perhaps the most misunderstood form of 'armour' we see. Freedom of movement, protection against the elements and foes, pockets! Robes are highly functional. I'm sure you can produce a beautiful set.'
Talk to Hambrennil
Perfect.
Talk to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Still stitching?'
Still stitching?
'Still stitching?'
Turn in a guild-pattern robe ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hambrennil
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern robe

'Robes are perhaps the most misunderstood form of 'armour' we see. Freedom of movement, protection against the elements and foes, pockets! Robes are highly functional. I'm sure you can produce a beautiful set.'
Perfect.
Talk to Hambrennil
Talk to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Warm, functional, just the right amount of flair. I adore it!'
Turn in a guild-pattern robe ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Warm, functional, just the right amount of flair. I adore it!'
